channel.title: CyrenePK [Spawn]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/9xuywfnep/bannerbigszize.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[COLOR=red][SIZE=5]Introduction[/color][SIZE=3] Are you sick of playing spawn servers that allow you to spawn everything? Do you despise how people still gamble on spawn servers even though you can spawn EVERYTHING? Well, this server offers thrilling pking,bossing and skilling. Each with its' separate rewards, making this spawn server complete. [/SIZE]
[CENTER][COLOR=green][SIZE=4]Lets start with In-Game Features - [/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER] - Nomad has a 100% chance drop of PVP gear (Nomad is in wilderness and spawns every 2 hours) - Only Combat stats can be set - Caskets ( recieve from slayer monster drops) - Duel Arena - All skills and almost flawless - Warrior's guild - Jad - Barrows - Achievement Shop - Ingame PK highscores - 2010 Look - Zoom in and out - BarrelChest - KBD - Dagganoth Kings - GWD - Corporal Beast - Chaos Elemental - Tormented Demons - KBD - Jad
[SIZE=5][COLOR=red][url=http://Cyrenepk.com]Play Now[/url]
[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Media[/SIZE]
[COLOR=red]Welcome Home [/COLOR] [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/1784/yr9d.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Donator Items turn into cash. [/COLOR] [IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/1090/dq7n.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]FunPK - [/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pDxx1z7.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Pk Shop (Items will be added with players advice) [/COLOR] [IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/2110/9ci4.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Barrel Chest Boss [/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/89rAo7b.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Skilling Island [/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5XVfScI.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Customizable Client [/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1ufmBR9.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Achievement Journal (colors change as you get further in
achievements) [/COLOR] [IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4725/1kl3.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Jad [/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cyWvudN.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Convenient tab [/COLOR] [img]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/6305/4iqh.png[/img]
[COLOR=red]Nomad [/COLOR] [img]http://i.picresize.com/images/2013/11/22/0whXn.png[/img]
[SIZE=6][COLOR=red][url=http://Cyrenepk.com]Play Now[/url]
[/COLOR][/SIZE]

item.title: CyrenePK [Spawn]
item.dc:creator: @hugandrob hugandrob
item.description:
@hugandrob wrote:

[CENTER] [/CENTER]

[COLOR=red][SIZE=5]Introduction[/color][SIZE=3]
Are you sick of playing spawn servers that allow you to spawn everything? Do you despise how people still gamble on spawn servers even though you can spawn EVERYTHING? Well, this server offers thrilling pking,bossing and skilling. Each with its’ separate rewards, making this spawn server complete. [/SIZE]

[CENTER][COLOR=green][SIZE=4]Lets start with In-Game Features -
[/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

  • Nomad has a 100% chance drop of PVP gear (Nomad is in wilderness and spawns every 2 hours)
  • Only Combat stats can be set
  • Caskets ( recieve from slayer monster drops)
  • Duel Arena
  • All skills and almost flawless
  • Warrior’s guild
  • Jad
  • Barrows
  • Achievement Shop
  • Ingame PK highscores
  • 2010 Look
  • Zoom in and out
  • BarrelChest
  • KBD
  • Dagganoth Kings
  • GWD
  • Corporal Beast
  • Chaos Elemental
  • Tormented Demons
  • KBD
  • Jad
